Big update this week, with loads of new features and bug fixes.
New Features:
Mark Movies, shows and episodes and watched, and never miss an episode,
Shows percentage of show watched, and all watched/unwatched episodes,
Rate movies, shows and episodes,
iCloud sync, sync your favourites, watched and ratings between all your devices.

Also in this update:
Minor UI changes for seasons and episodes,
Minor bug fixes and improvements,

I've been doing lots of background work to improve notifications, so I've added new settings page to fully customise app push notifications.
I've also done a few small quality of life bug fixes.

Thanks for all your feedback.

* Follow people (actors, directors etc), then get notified when they are in a new movie or show.
* Share cast and crew members.

* Added new notification setting to enable/disable notifications about people you have followed.

New:
* New profile page, get statistics on movies and shows you have watched, and recommendations on what to watch next.
* See all your favourite Shows, Movies and Actors, and filter by watched status.
* New home screen layout,
* New top 10 shows and movies pages, to help you discover the best streaming content.

Fixes:
* Lots of minor bug fixes and improvements, loading speed should be much faster now.

This update adds a new Smart Subscriptions feature!

With an ever-increasing number of streaming services, you can’t afford to subscribe to all of them, especially if you only want to watch one or two shows.

Smart Subscriptions can solve this problem, Smart Subscriptions will calculate the best time of year for you to subscribe to each service, by looking at the release dates for all of your favorite shows and movies.
This will enable you to get the most out of each service while subscribing for the shortest time possible.

The prices are indications ONLY and the real amount saved will depend on local pricing and how closely you follow Smart Subscriptions recommendations.
By default Smart Subscriptions will use the average price in USD, you can edit the prices in settings to more accurately reflect your savings.

Smart Subscriptions is currently in Beta and feedback is welcome.
